txt.en: Herefara can be found in the War-stead of the Helmingas.\n\nYou should speak with Herefara.
You should patrol Taur Drúadan with Herefara by your side.
The Orcs upon Eilenach seem to be concerned with something in the forest
Speak with Herefara.
Speak with Herefara
Herefara can be found in the War-stead of the Helmingas.\n\nYou should speak with Herefara.
Use the whistle to summon your new friend if you become separated

'It is possible that the Enemy is trying to find us from all sides. We must be ready! I have been asked to patrol around the encampment. Do you recall me saying when last we met that I would have you fight by my side any day? These words still hold true, my friend. Come, let us patrol the surrounding hills together. If we encounter the Enemy, then let us take arms against them!'
Talk to Herefara to dismiss him
All seems quiet to the west
'[placeholder], you have my thanks. You continue to help keep our encampment a secret from the Enemy. Now it is time to help with more pressing matters.'
Some spying Orcs hide out on Nardol's point!
All seems quiet on Nardol
'I thank you for aiding me on my patrol. Still, there is much to do. I will meet you back at the Rohirrim encampment.'
All is quiet atop Eilenach
Speak with Herefara
Patrol Eilenach
Patrol the river crossing to the Beacon Hills
Patrol Nardol's look-out
Herefara decides a patrol is needed to secure the Rohirrim's encampment. He has asked you to accompany him on the patrol.
Patrol Nardol
Use the whistle to summon your new friend if you become separated
Patrol Eilenach's beacon
Herefara has asked you to patrol Taur Drúadan with him
'Call me to your side when you wish to depart.'
Herefara's Patrol
